definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: That poses a challenge for China's navy, which is mostly designed for coastal defense.
sentences.chinese: 這給用於海防的中國海軍帶來了挑戰。

sentences.english: For my country to increase the strength of Haiphong.
sentences.chinese: 爲我的祖國增加海防的力量。

sentences.english: Battleship radar sets permit accurate night bombardment of enemy ships or shore installations.
sentences.chinese: 艦載雷達有助於對敵艦或海防設施進行準確的夜襲。

sentences.english: The fourth part treats WEI Yuan's thought on coastal defense.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分對魏源的有關海防思想進行探討。

sentences.english: In Qing Dynasty Government, Li Hongzhang is the main leader and practitioner of the construction of coast defense.
sentences.chinese: 李鴻章是清政府海防建設的主要領導人和實踐者。

sentences.english: A group of well-known scholars appeared in the early Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清代前期出現了一批研究海防地理的著名學者。

sentences.english: South Australia has always been a city of Haiphong, the military vital importance.
sentences.chinese: 南澳歷來是海防重鎮，兵家必爭之地。

sentences.english: Coast defence is one important part of ancient military views in China.
sentences.chinese: 海防思想是中國古代軍事思想中的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Haiphong is the third largest city in the Southeast Asian country.
sentences.chinese: 越南海防市是東南亞第三大城市。

sentences.english: The coastal guard kept a watchful eye on the black spot that had appeared out at sea.
sentences.chinese: 海防戰士警覺地注視着出現在海面上的黑點。

sentences.english: The establishment of Foochow Shipbuilding Istitution was the first milestone of the education for modern coast denfence.
sentences.chinese: 福州船政學堂的創辦開近代海防教育之先河。

sentences.english: The enemy’s Achilles’ heel was his harbour defense.
Brennan Torpedo Station of Hong Kong Museum of Coastal Defence, Shaukeiwan, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 香港海防博物館布倫南魚雷發射站，筲箕灣。

sentences.english: China practices an administration system of sharing responsibilities between the military and the local authorities in border and coastal defense.
sentences.chinese: 中國邊海防實行軍地分工負責的防衛管理體制。

sentences.english: He lives at Flat 16E, Block3, Lijingyuan Estate, 50 Haifang Road, Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 他住在上海海防路50號麗晶苑三號樓16樓E室。

definition: north China navy (esp. the ill-fated Chinese navy in the 1895 war with Japan)
Weihaiwei, late Qing naval port in Weihai 威海, Shandong
Sino-French War (1883-1885) (concerning French seizure of Vietnam)
Taku Forts, maritime defense works in Tianjin dating back to the Ming dynasty, playing a prominent role during the Opium Wars (1839-1860)
